Title: L'omm 'e casa
Writer: Roberto Saviano (idea), Roberto Saviano (novel), Giovanni Bianconi (developer), Stefano Bises (developer), Leonardo Fasoli (developer), Ludovica Rampoldi (developer), Roberto Saviano (developer), Stefano Bises (story editor), Leonardo Fasoli
Actors: Marco D'Amore, Fortunato Cerlino, Maria Pia Calzone, Salvatore Esposito
Plot: Pietro is in jail but still commands as he engages in a battle of wills with the warden, directs the clan to make alliances, and tries to help his nephew. Recovering from an accident and now man of the house, Genny wants to impress Noemi.
